code: import{Col}from"react-bootstrap";import"./product-card.css";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{addToCart}from"../../app/features/cart/cartSlice";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductCard=function ProductCard(_ref){var title=_ref.title,productItem=_ref.productItem;var dispatch=useDispatch();var router=useNavigate();var handelClick=function handelClick(){router("/shop/".concat(productItem.id));};var handelAdd=function handelAdd(productItem){dispatch(addToCart({product:productItem,num:1}));toast.success("Product has been added to cart!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{md:3,sm:5,xs:10,className:"product mtop",children:[title==="Big Discount"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"discount",children:[productItem.discount,"% Off"]}):null,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{loading:"lazy",onClick:function onClick(){return handelClick();},src:productItem.imgUrl,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-like",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ion-icon",{name:"heart-outline"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{onClick:function onClick(){return handelClick();},children:productItem.productName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rate",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-star"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-star"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["$",productItem.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{"aria-label":"Add",type:"submit",className:"add",onClick:function onClick(){return handelAdd(productItem);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ion-icon",{name:"add"})})]})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
